full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Security Design Services (SDS) - Tier 2
### Solicitation Details

* **Title (English/French)**: TBIPS - Request for Proposal for Security Design Services (SDS) - Tier 2 - PSAB / SPICT - Demande de propositions pour les Services de conception de sécurité (FDS) - palier 2 - SAEA
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01025459
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: R129464A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-22T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-03-01
* **Status**: Expiré / Expired

### Solicitation Description

Shared Services Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Security Design Services (SDS) under Tier 2 of the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) to qualified contractors. The services required include:

* Strategic IT Security Planning and Protection Consultant
* IT Security Methodology, Policy and Procedures Analyst
* IT Security Threat and Risk Assessment and Certification and Accreditation Analyst
* Public Key Infrastructure Specialist
* IT Security Design Specialist

The expected start date for the contracts is after the award, and Shared Services Canada estimates a requirement of 220 days per resource over a period of 2 years. The preferred location for the provision of services is the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Evaluation Criteria and Process

Shared Services Canada will evaluate proposals based on the TBIPS Evaluation Criteria. Only those Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the specified categories will be eligible to submit a proposal.

### Additional Requirements

Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement. The documents and instructions are available in both official languages, and bidders are advised that BuyandSell.GC.CA is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or requests for information, please contact Dusan Adamov at:

* Name: Dusan Adamov
* Phone: 613-294-2380
* Email: dusan.adamov@canada.ca

Thank you for your interest in this procurement opportunity.
---

Go ahead and ask me if you need anything... I am at your service!  MaryLuo. [
